title: Fort Necessity National Battlefield: Teacher Workshops
body: Explore This Park    Learn About the Park     Education     Professional Development     Teacher Workshops                Teacher Workshops        Presenter at a Fort Necessity teacher workshop National Park Service   Â    Fort Necessity occassionally offers teacher workshops. Currently there are no workshops scheduled. The staff is also available to present continuing education session to groups of teachers. If you would like to inquire about bringing a group of teachers please call 724-329-8124 or email us.
